meanings.definition: Enzymes that are secreted by a cell and function outside of the cell.
meanings.sent1: The exoenzymes helped the cell by working outside.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study exoenzymes to understand cell processes better.
meanings.sent3: The exoenzymes threw a party outside the cell.
meanings.sent4: The exoenzymes acted like tiny workers outside the cell.
meanings.sent5: Imagine exoenzymes as little helpers outside the cell walls.

meanings.definition: Enzymes that break down large molecules into smaller molecules outside of the cell.
meanings.sent1: Small organisms rely on exoenzymes to break down food outside.
meanings.sent2: Exoenzymes play a crucial role in digestion outside cells.
meanings.sent3: The exoenzymes had a picnic outside, breaking down big sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The exoenzymes were like tiny scissors cutting molecules outside.
meanings.sent5: Exoenzymes are like molecular chefs, chopping big molecules into small pieces.
